# Search

This theme ships full-text search by default, thi is one of the core reasons for the birth of this theme. For now uou just need to move the mouse to the search box to type some keywords:

Note that there are no server-side dependencies here, it just works out of the box, thanks for the great work of @leo-buneev (opens new window) at vuepress-plugin-fulltext-search (opens new window).
